page.title: 10EDUCATION 4
page.content: At the age of 16 pupils at Hartismere High School take examinations, either Certificate of Secondary Education or Ordinary Level General Certificate of Education. Then they leave, either to find work or to go to a Sixth Form Unit or to College. This can be the Suffolk College in Ipswich where they can study for the Advanced Level GCE, or other qualifications in many different subjects such as - Catering, Fashion, Art, Hairdressing,Secretarial Work, the Engineering branches. Afterwards they can go to other Colleges or Universities to study for 3 or 4 more years.
